parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
On this account, because, for. From dia and hoti; on the very account that, or inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.
Badly, evilly, wrongly. From kakos; badly.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To spend, bear expense, waste, squander. From dapane; to expend, i.e. to incur cost, or to waste.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From handano; sensual delight; by implication, desire.
